original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz faces opposition from coalition partners over his plan to send troops to Ukraine, with the Social Democratic Party only supporting the move if the US leads. Trump has ruled out deploying US ground troops to Ukraine, but may offer air support if hostilities end. A Ukrainian man is arrested in Germany for suspected involvement in the Nord Stream pipeline sabotage. Israel launches an attack on Gaza City.</s>
